title: BRIEF-Megaworld Co And Unit Global-Estate Resorts To Jointly Develop Property
text:
BRIEF-Megaworld Co And Unit Global-Estate Resorts To Jointly Develop Property

Stock Markets 18 minutes ago (Sep 16, 2019 10:00)

BRIEF-Megaworld Co And Unit Global-Estate Resorts To Jointly Develop Property Sept 16 (Reuters) - Megaworld Corp :

* CO AND UNIT GLOBAL-ESTATE RESORTS TO JOINTLY DEVELOP

251-HECTARE

PROPERTY INTO NEW ‘SUSTAINABLE' TOWNSHIP IN CAVITE

* MEGAWORLD AND GERI WILL SPEND 18-BILLION PESOS TO DEVELOP

ARDEN

BOTANICAL ESTATE IN THE NEXT 15 YEARS
